summary: In this filmed Chekhov adaptation, Olga is an alluring peasant woman who lures cynical aristocrat Fedor away from his milquetoast fiancée, with tragic consequences.
cast: George Sanders|Linda Darnell|Anna Lee|Edward Everett Horton|Hugo Haas|Laurie Lane|John Philliber|Sig Ruman|John Abbott|Mary Servoss|André Charlot|Robert Greig|Nina Koshetz|Paul Hurst|Charles Trowbridge|Don Brodie|Woody Charles|Jimmy Conlin|Rex Evans|Byron Foulger|Joyce Gates|Kenneth Jones|John Kelly|Gabriel Lenoff|Kate MacKenna|Mike Mazurki|Sharon McManus|Francis Morris|Fred Nurney|Frank Orth|Sarah Padden|Constance Purdy|Elizabeth Russell|Ann Staunton|Anita Venge|Charles Wagenheim
title: Extraña confesión
